hero.title: Commander
hero.text: Endless powerful web shortcuts using everyday language. Just type what you want to do and Commander will figure out what you mean.

facets.title: Say what you mean
facets.text: Just type or say what you want to do, and we’ll help you do it. Want to search for a word across tabs? Share a screenshot? Set a reminder?  Just type it however you’d say it.

facets.title: Demystify commands
facets.text: Check out everything you can do using the Commander glossary. Get ideas on what shortcuts you’re not taking advantage of, and start using them to save time.

facets.title: Make your own shortcuts
facets.text: Have a shortcut you want but don’t see? Just add it to the glossary and we’ll create it for you. When enough people create the same command, we’ll make it available for everyone.
